CTO Models.CTO Models: HPE DL360 Gen12 4LFF NC CTO Svr
CTO Models.AdditionalInfo:
4LFF CTO Model
Includes below:
 - One 4LFF SAS/SATA Drive cage
 - One Primary Riser
 - Two OCP Slots
CTO Models.RuleDescription1: Must select Processor, Memory and Power Supply.
CTO Models.RuleDescription2: Minimum One card (PCIe or OCP) must be selected from Networking category.
CTO Models.RuleDescription3: "BCM 5719 1Gb 4p BASE-T OCP Adptr" to be defaulted in the configurator. Customer is allowed to remove and select other cards (PCIe of OCP) from Networking category.
CTO Models.RuleDescription4: If the CTO Server is selected with Rack, then "HPE Easy Install Rail 5 Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
CTO Models.RuleDescription5: Supported Rail kit to be defaulted for CTO Server in the configurator. But customer can deselect the Rail kit if the CTO Server is selected without Rack (Standalone server).
CTO Models.RuleDescription6:
4LFF CTO Models:
Prioritization list for Primary controller selection is as follows:

 - HPE MR416i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR416i-p Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr
 - HPE MR408i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR216i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR216i-p Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr
CTO Models.RuleDescription7:
OCA RED ERROR/ CLIC UNB with below message If DLC server (ie, with DLC CPM, Tubeset) is selected without supported DLC rack.

"DL3XX Gen12 DLC support requires at least one liquid cooling infrastructure items as follows: 
HPE Rack in 800mmx1200mm, Rack Manifold, CDU, Primary Hose Kit and Secondary Hose Kit in order to function. Without above rack infrastructure to be selected, an unbuildable configuration will be triggered in this order.

Rack 42U 800mm x 1200mm Ent G2 (applicable for ProLiant Gen12 DL3XX DLC)
Rack 48U 800mm x 1200mm Ent G2 (applicable for ProLiant Gen12 DL3XX DLC)"
CTO Models.RuleDescription8: If there is no controller or cable or LFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.
CTO Models.RuleDescription9:
If any controller or cable or 4LFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if controller or cable or LFF drive is selected.
CTO Models.RuleDescription10:
For 4LFF CTO Server:

Configurator behviour on Smart Chassis:

* User need to select the below items and configurator to display the Smart Chassis naming/ ID based on the selection
 - Appropriate Ambient temperature
 - Controller
* Once the above selections are completed, configurator to show the relevant Smart Chassis naming/ ID for the customer based on Smart Chassis Matrix.
* After user selects the Smart Chassis naming/ ID, configurator will show actual Menu view (Processor, Memory..etc.,) 
* Ambient temperature SKUs are listed in "Ambient Temperature" category.
* Smart Chassis comprises of allowed combinations of controller for 4LFF CTO Server that comes with 4LFF Drive cage.
* OCA to default the selected controller and the required Cable kits in the OCA Menu view this is based on preselect questions for Smart Chassis. Cables should NOT be allowed to change from the preselected option.


If User opts for HPE Preferred default in the Smart Chassis, configurator to default the below components:
* 1 quantity of MR408i-o controller
* 30C Ampient Temperature and DAC tracking

Processors.RuleDescription1: Mixing of different Processor is NOT allowed.
Processors.RuleDescription2:
If the selected Processor Wattage is more than 185W and less than or equal to 270W, then "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected.
 
Configurator to default "Performance Heatsink" and "Performance Fan" upon Processor selection. But customer should be allowed to remove and select "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling".
Processors.RuleDescription3:
For Processor Wattage <271W:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected, then Maximum Processor selection will be reduced from 2 to 1.
Processors.RuleDescription4:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when >20C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking

If Processor >165W and <=270W is selected with Standard/ Performance Heat Sink and selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then 4EDSFF Drive cage cannot be selected.
Processors.RuleDescription5:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when >20C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking

If Processor >165W is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G) and no DLC Module selected, then Maximum 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking Drive cage can be selected.
Processors.RuleDescription6:
8SFF CTO Server:
Applicable when >23C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking

If Processor >165W is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G) and no DLC Module selected, then Drive cage cannot be selected.
Processors.RuleDescription7:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when >25C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with DAC tracking

If Processor >165W is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G) and no DLC Module selected, then Maximum 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking Drive cage can be selected.
Processors.RuleDescription8:
8SFF CTO Server:
Applicable when >25C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with DAC tracking

If Processor >165W is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G) and no DLC Module selected, then drive cage cannot be selected.

Heatsink and Accessories.Heatsink and Accessories: HPE DL3XX Gen12 CPM FIO Kit PCIe
Heatsink and Accessories.AdditionalInfo:
PCIe DLC Module
 - Contains 2 Cold Plate Module and 1 Quick Disconnect Module
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription1:
If the selected Processor Wattage is less than or equal to 185W, then "Standard Heatsink and Standard Fan" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected. 

Configurator to default "Standard Heatsink" and "Standard Fan" upon Processor selection. But Customer is allowed to remove and select "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan"
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription2:
If the selected Processor Wattage is more than 185W and less than or equal to 270W, then "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected.
 
Configurator to default "Performance Heatsink" and "Performance Fan" upon Processor selection. But customer should be allowed to remove and select "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling".
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription3:
If Processor Wattage is more than 300W, then "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" or "DLC Module" must be selected. 
Configurator to default "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" upon Processor selection and allow the customer to remove and select "DLC Module".
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription4: If DLC Module is selected, then Minimum 2 quantity of Processor must be selected.
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription5:
Max 1 of Liquid cooling can be selected from the below:
 - Closed Loop Liquid Cooling
 - DLC Module
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription6: If "DLC Module" is selected, then "Secondary FH Riser" cannot be selected.
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription7: If DLC Module is selected, then "Secondary LP Riser" must be selected and be defaulted.
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription8:
If customer selects "DLC Module" which is a Direct Liquid Cooled solution (DLC)  then below Warning Message to be displayed in the configurators/ CLIC:
Warning: "DLC Solution is supported with specific Racks only. Please refer QuickSpecs for more details.
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription9:
If customer selects "DLC Module" which is a Direct Liquid Cooled solution (DLC) and server is ordered as Standalone (without any HPE Rack), then below Warning Message to be displayed in the configurators/ CLIC:

Warning Message: “DL360 Gen12 DLC support requires liquid cooling infrastructure items as follows: HPE Rack, Rack Manifold, CDU, Primary Hose Kit and Secondary Hose Kit in order to function. If customer already has this infrastructure to support DLC on site, then server can be shipped as a standalone unit as an upgrade. Server will not function without these infrastructure for DLC.
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription10:
If NVMe/ SAS4 is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling Heatsink or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling ot DLC Module.
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription11:
If Networking/ InfiniBand that is 100G or more, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid Cooling Heatsink or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling or DLC Module
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription12:
If 256GB DIMM is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling or DLC Module
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription13:
If NS204i-u is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling or DLC Module
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription14: If 256GB DIMM is selected without DLC Module, then high speed Networking/ InfiniBand card (PCIe and OCP) that is 100G or more cannot be selected.
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription15: If PCIe DLC Module is selected, then slot# 3 cannot be used. This must be considered for all PCIe card selection.
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription16: If CLLC or DLC is selected with 256GB DIMM and the Total DIMM selection is less than 32 quantity, then DIMM blank must be selected and be defaulted.
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription17: If CLLC or DLC is selected without 256GB DIMM, then DIMM blank cannot be selected
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription18: If Performance Heatsink or DLC Module is selected, then Performance Fan must be selected and be defaulted. vice versa
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription19:
If Graphics Option is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling ot DLC Module
Heatsink and Accessories.RuleDescription20: If DLC Module is selected, then "HPE DL3XX Gen11 DLC 45cm QD Tube FIO Kit" must be selected and vice versa.

Memory.RuleDescription1:
Below Warning message to be displayed in the configurators upon selection:
"More detailed information about Memory population rules can be found in Server Memory SharePoint https://www.hpe.com/docs/server-memory"
Memory.RuleDescription2: x8 and x4 cannot be mixed.
Memory.RuleDescription3: 3DS and non-3DS Memory cannot be mixed.
Memory.RuleDescription4: 96GB Memory cannot be mixed with any other Memory.
Memory.RuleDescription5: 128GB Memory cannot be mixed with any other Memory.
Memory.RuleDescription6: Mixing of different Rank Memory is not allowed if less than 16 quantity of Memory is selected for 1 Processor configuration.
Memory.RuleDescription7: Mixing of different Rank Memory is not allowed if less than 32 quantity of Memory is selected for 2 Processor configuration.
Memory.RuleDescription8: If different Rank Memory are mixed, then quantity of each Memory part number must be same.
Memory.RuleDescription9: 16GB & 256GB are allowed with Granite Rapids CPU (6xxxP) only.
Memory.RuleDescription10: If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 1 Processor and Single Rank memory, then Memory Min = 2 and Max= 16.
Memory.RuleDescription11: If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 2 Processors and Single Rank memory, then Memory Min = 4 and Max= 32.

Memory.RuleDescription1:
If 256GB DIMM is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling or DLC Module
Memory.RuleDescription2: If 256GB DIMM is selected without DLC Module, then high speed Networking/ InfiniBand card (PCIe and OCP) that is 100G or more cannot be selected.
Memory.RuleDescription3:
Below Warning message to be displayed in the configurators upon selection:
"More detailed information about Memory population rules can be found in Server Memory SharePoint https://www.hpe.com/docs/server-memory"
Memory.RuleDescription4: x8 and x4 cannot be mixed.
Memory.RuleDescription5: 3DS and non-3DS Memory cannot be mixed.
Memory.RuleDescription6: 96GB Memory cannot be mixed with any other Memory.
Memory.RuleDescription7: 128GB Memory cannot be mixed with any other Memory.
Memory.RuleDescription8: Mixing of different Rank Memory is not allowed if less than 16 quantity of Memory is selected for 1 Processor configuration.
Memory.RuleDescription9: Mixing of different Rank Memory is not allowed if less than 32 quantity of Memory is selected for 2 Processor configuration.
Memory.RuleDescription10: If different Rank Memory are mixed, then quantity of each Memory part number must be same.
Memory.RuleDescription11: 16GB & 256GB are allowed with Granite Rapids CPU (6xxxP) only.
Memory.RuleDescription12: If 256GB DIMM is selected, then Maximum 8 quantity of Memory can be selected per Processor.
Memory.RuleDescription13: If CLLC or DLC is selected with 256GB DIMM and the Total DIMM selection is less than 32 quantity, then DIMM blank must be selected and be defaulted.
Memory.RuleDescription14: If CLLC or DLC is selected without 256GB DIMM, then DIMM blank cannot be selected
Memory.RuleDescription15: If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 1 Processor and Dual/Quad/ Octal Rank memory then, Memory Min = 1 and Max= 16.
Memory.RuleDescription16: If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 2 Processors and Dual/Quad/ Octal Rank memory, then Memory Min = 2 and Max= 32
Memory.RuleDescription17: If Memory Fault Tolerance is selected, then only x4 memory options can be selected.
Memory.RuleDescription18: If Graphics Option is selected, then 256GB DIMM cannot be selected.
Memory.RuleDescription19:
Hybrid Chassis:
Applicable when >25C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking

If DLC is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then 256GB DIMM cannot be selected.

Memory Blank Kit.RuleDescription1: If Qty 32 of Memory is selected, then DIMM Blanks kit cannot be selected.
Memory Blank Kit.RuleDescription2: If Standard Heatsink or Performance Heat sink is selected and total Memory selection is less than 32 quantity, then DIMM blank must be selected and be defaulted.
Memory Blank Kit.RuleDescription3: If CLLC or DLC is selected with 256GB DIMM and the Total DIMM selection is less than 32 quantity, then DIMM blank must be selected and be defaulted.

Drive Cage.Drive Cage: HPE DL3XX G12 1U 4EDSFF NVMe Stck BP Kit
Drive Cage.AdditionalInfo: 4EDSFF BP - Supports 4 QTY of EDSFF Drives.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription1: Supported with Hybrid CTO Server only.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription2:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Max 5 quantity of below cages can be selected:
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U 4EDSFF NVMe Stck BP Kit
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U 2SFF x4 TM Stck BP Kit 
 - HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit
Drive Cage.RuleDescription3:
Hybrid CTO Server: 
If "HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit" is selected, then maximum 3 quantity of below drive cages can be selected.

Max 3 quantity of below cages can be selected:
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U 4EDSFF NVMe Stck BP Kit
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U 2SFF x4 TM Stck BP Kit
Drive Cage.RuleDescription4:
For Hybrid CTO Server:
Minimum one of below drive cage must be selected.
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U 4EDSFF NVMe Stck BP Kit 
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U 2SFF x4 TM Stck BP Kit
Drive Cage.RuleDescription5:
4EDSFF drive cage will be able to support EDSFF NVMe drive when there is no controller selected. 
Direct Attach is capable to support EDSFF NVMe only in this drive cage.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription6:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If the controller is not selected in 1 Processor configuration, then one quantity of "P72211-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 CPU1 B1/2 Cbl Kit " must be selected and be defaulted

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription7:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If the controller is not selected in 2 Processor configuration, then one quantity of "P72213-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF P2 B1/P1 B4 Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription8:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected, then one quantity of "P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit" or "P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit" must be selected.

Configurator to default "P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit". Customer is allowed to remove "P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit" and select "P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit".

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription9:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected, then Maximum one of the below cable can be selected. Both cannot be selected.

 - P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
Drive Cage.RuleDescription10:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected, then one quantity of "P72600-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x2 B1 B2 OCPA Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription11:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
Maximum of One MR216i-p/ MR416i-p/ MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller can be selected.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription12:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If the controller is not selected and 1 quantity of Processor is selected, then one quantity of "P76501-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B1 Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription13:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If the controller is not selected and 2 quantity of Processor is selected, then one quantity of "P76502-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P2 B1 Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription14:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected, then one quantity of "P76506-B21  HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF MRx16 PCIe B1 Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription15:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected with one quantity of "P76506-B21  HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF MRx16 PCIe B1 Cbl Kit", then "HPE DL360 Gen12 NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" cannot be selected.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription16:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
Maximum of One MR216i-p/ MR416i-p controller can be selected.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription17:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller cannot be selected.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription18:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If there is no controller selected and 1 quantity of Processor is selected, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 2 qty of P72211-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 CPU1 B1/2 Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription19:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If there is no controller selected and 2 quantity of Processor is selected, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P72213-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF P2 B1/P1 B4 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72601-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF P2 B2/P1 B3/5 Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription20:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected without any other controller, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P72600-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x2 B1 B2 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription21:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected without any other controller, then 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit or 1 qty of P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit must be selected.

Configurator to default to 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit. User is allowed to remove and select 1 qty of P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit.

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription22:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected without any other controller, then below cable kits cannot be selected together.

 - P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
Drive Cage.RuleDescription23:
Hybrid CTO Server:

Hybrid CTO Server:

Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 23C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking 

If Closed Loop Liquid cooling is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then Maximum 2 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage can be selected.

Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when >23C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking 

If Closed Loop Liquid cooling is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then 4EDSFF drive cage cannot be selected.

If MR408i-o is the only controller selected, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS DA Pwr Cbl Kit"must be selected and be defaulted.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription9:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o is selected without MR216i-p/ MR416i-p, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit"must be selected and be defaulted.

User is allowed to remove "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" and select "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS DA Pwr Cbl Kit".
Drive Cage.RuleDescription10:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected without MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o, then "HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.

User is allowed to remove "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit" and select "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS DA Pwr Cbl Kit".
Drive Cage.RuleDescription11:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected with MR216i-p/ MR416i-p, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit"must be selected and be defaulted.

If User removes these cable, then "HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" must be selected and defaulted.

8SFF CTO Server: 
If 8SFF x1 Drive cage is selected without 2SFF x4 Drive cage, then Max 1 of controller can be selected.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription13:
8SFF CTO Server: 
If 8SFF x1 Drive cage is selected with 2SFF x4 Drive cage, then Maximum 1 of PCIe and Maximum 1 of OROC controller can be selected.
Drive Cage.RuleDescription14:
For 8SFF CTO Server:
SFF drive requires the selection of 8SFF x1 or 2SFF x4 Drive cage

8SFF CTO Server:
Applicable when 27C/ 30C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then Drive cage cannot be selected.

Applicable when 30C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking

If Closed Loop Liquid cooling is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then Drive cage cannot be selected.

Factory Configuration Settings.Factory Configuration Settings: HPE OEM FIO Approved Server Appliance
Factory Configuration Settings.RuleDescription1:
For EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1) and "HPE OEM FIO Approved Server Appliance" is not selected, then CLIC should trigger below UNB:
"This system does not meet the EU Lot9 energy efficiency requirements and cannot be put into service, installed, or supplied in the EU. 96% efficient (Titanium) FlexSlot power supply is mandated to meet the Lot9 requirements."
Factory Configuration Settings.RuleDescription2:
For non-EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1) and "HPE OEM FIO Approved Server Appliance" is not selected, then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" must be selected and be defaulted. 
If the "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" is not selected in this scenario, then Configurator RED ERROR/ CLIC UNB must be triggered with the below message. 
"This system does not meet the EU Lot9 energy efficiency requirements and cannot be put into service, installed, or supplied in the EU. 96% efficient (Titanium) FlexSlot power supply is mandated to meet the Lot9 requirements."

Factory Configuration Settings.Factory Configuration Settings: HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit
Factory Configuration Settings.RuleDescription1:
For non-EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1), then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" must be defaulted in configurator.
Factory Configuration Settings.RuleDescription2:
For non-EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1) and "HPE OEM FIO Approved Server Appliance" is not selected, then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" must be selected and be defaulted. 
If the "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" is not selected in this scenario, then Configurator RED ERROR/ CLIC UNB must be triggered with the below message. 
"This system does not meet the EU Lot9 energy efficiency requirements and cannot be put into service, installed, or supplied in the EU. 96% efficient (Titanium) FlexSlot power supply is mandated to meet the Lot9 requirements."
Factory Configuration Settings.RuleDescription3:
For non-EU countries:
If a Lot 9 compliant power supply is configured, then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" cannot be selected.

Ambient Temperature.Ambient Temperature: HPE 30C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk
Ambient Temperature.RuleDescription1:
Minimum and Maximum One of below Intel temperature tracking SKU must be selected.

 - HPE 30C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk 
 - HPE 27C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk 
 - HPE 25C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk 
 - HPE 23C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk 
 - HPE 20C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk 
 - HPE 18C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk
Ambient Temperature.RuleDescription2:
Hybrid CTO Server: 
Applicable when >25C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking:

If Standard or Performance Heatsink is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then 4EDSFF drive cage cannot be selected.
Ambient Temperature.RuleDescription3:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when >23C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking 

If Closed Loop Liquid cooling is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then 4EDSFF drive cage cannot be selected.
Ambient Temperature.RuleDescription4:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 27C/ 30C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then Maximum 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking Drive cage can be selected.
Ambient Temperature.RuleDescription5:
8SFF CTO Server:
Applicable when 27C/ 30C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then Drive cage cannot be selected.
Ambient Temperature.RuleDescription6:

 - HPE 30C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk

 - HPE 25C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk 
 - HPE 23C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk 
 - HPE 20C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk 
 - HPE 18C Sys Inlet Op Temp Config Trk

Battery Upgrade Removal Setting.Battery Upgrade Removal Setting: HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery
Battery Upgrade Removal Setting.RuleDescription1: If "HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery" is selected, then MR416/ MR408 controller does not require selection of Battery.
Battery Upgrade Removal Setting.RuleDescription2: If "HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery" is selected, then MR416/ MR408 controller must be selected.
Battery Upgrade Removal Setting.RuleDescription3: If "HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery" is selected, then Battery/ capacity cannot be selected.

BIOS Mode.BIOS Mode: HPE Gen10+ Platf RAS OS Ctrl FIO Setting

Drive Configuration Settings.Drive Configuration Settings: HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set
Drive Configuration Settings.RuleDescription1: If there is no controller or cable or LFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.
Drive Configuration Settings.RuleDescription2:
If any controller or cable or 4LFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if controller or cable or LFF drive is selected.
Drive Configuration Settings.RuleDescription3: If there is no 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.
Drive Configuration Settings.RuleDescription4:
If any 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if 8SFF drive cage or controller or cable or SFF drive is selected.
Drive Configuration Settings.RuleDescription5:
If "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" is selected for 4LFF CTO Server, then below Warning message to be displayed.
"Any LFF drive selection in 4LFF Chassis requires the selection of controller."
Drive Configuration Settings.RuleDescription6:
If "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" is selected for 8SFF CTO Server, then below Warning message to be displayed.
"Any drive selection in 8SFF Chassis requires selection of 8SFF Backplane and the controller. 2SFF Backplane can support NVMe without controller, but requires the selection of 8SFF Backplane."

ENERGY STAR.ENERGY STAR: HPE Energy Star4.0 configuration FIO kit

iLO Common Password.iLO Common Password: HPE iLO Common Password FIO Setting
iLO Common Password.AdditionalInfo: Sets common iLO password, instead of randomly generated password for each server during Factory Diagnostics

Logical Size Settings.AdditionalInfo: This option requires at least 200GB of logical space.  This option will not increase a sub-200GB logical space to 200GB.

Memory Setting.Memory Setting: HPE Memory Fast Fault Tolerance FIO Kit
Memory Setting.RuleDescription1: If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 1 Processor and Single Rank memory, then Memory Min = 2 and Max= 16.
Memory Setting.RuleDescription2: If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 1 Processor and Dual/Quad/ Octal Rank memory then, Memory Min = 1 and Max= 16.
Memory Setting.RuleDescription3: If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 2 Processors and Single Rank memory, then Memory Min = 4 and Max= 32.
Memory Setting.RuleDescription4: If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 2 Processors and Dual/Quad/ Octal Rank memory, then Memory Min = 2 and Max= 32
Memory Setting.RuleDescription5: If Memory Fault Tolerance is selected, then only x4 memory options can be selected.

OEM Configuration Setting.OEM Configuration Setting: HPE OEM FIO Server Unbranding Service

RAID Settings.RuleDescription1:
General RAID rules: 
If user selects any one of the above RAID settings, then the below requirements must be met.
i. Any one of the controllers must be selected (refer to controller priority list in Model X section)
ii. Any of the drives with SAS/SATA/NVMe in description (under Hard Drive category) must be selected.
iii. All drives used in RAID must be the same part number.
iv. If Factory installed OS and Controller are present, then RAID must be selected.
v.  Minimum drives as mentioned below must be selected,
                - (i) RAID 0 requires at least 1 drive.
                - (ii) RAID 1 requires at least 2 or even number of drives.
               - (iii) RAID 1 with Spare requires at least 3 drives.
               - (iv) RAID 5 requires at least 3 drives. 
               - (v) RAID 5 with Spare requires at least 4 drives. 
               - (vi) RAID Adv requires at least 4 drives.
RAID Settings.RuleDescription2: If MR416i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is the Primary controller, then all RAID levels are allowed.
RAID Settings.RuleDescription3: If MR216i-o/MR216i-p is the primary controller, then only following RAID levels are allowed: 0, 1
RAID Settings.RuleDescription4: If Premium VROC is the primary controller, then the following RAID levels are allowed: 0, 1, 5.
RAID Settings.RuleDescription5: If Direct Attach is the Primary controller, then RAID is NOT allowed.

RAID Settings.RuleDescription2: If MR416i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is the Primary controller, then all RAID levels are allowed.
RAID Settings.RuleDescription3: If Direct Attach is the Primary controller, then RAID is NOT allowed.

RAID Settings.RAID Settings: HPE Raid Adv Data Guarding FIO
RAID Settings.RuleDescription1:
General RAID rules: 
If user selects any one of the above RAID settings, then the below requirements must be met.
i. Any one of the controllers must be selected (refer to controller priority list in Model X section)
ii. Any of the drives with SAS/SATA/NVMe in description (under Hard Drive category) must be selected.
iii. All drives used in RAID must be the same part number.
iv. If Factory installed OS and Controller are present, then RAID must be selected.
v.  Minimum drives as mentioned below must be selected,
                - (i) RAID 0 requires at least 1 drive.
                - (ii) RAID 1 requires at least 2 or even number of drives.
               - (iii) RAID 1 with Spare requires at least 3 drives.
               - (iv) RAID 5 requires at least 3 drives. 
               - (v) RAID 5 with Spare requires at least 4 drives. 
               - (vi) RAID Adv requires at least 4 drives.
RAID Settings.RuleDescription2: If MR416i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is the Primary controller, then all RAID levels are allowed.
RAID Settings.RuleDescription3: If Direct Attach is the Primary controller, then RAID is NOT allowed.

RAID Settings.RAID Settings: HPE Customer Defined RAID Setti ALL
RAID Settings.RuleDescription1:
(i) If this part number is selected then the following RAID rules do not apply:
        - Max of 1 RAID level per server.
        - All integrated hard drives must match.
        - Minimum drive quantity requirement for each RAID level.
        - RAID level must be selected if Factory Installed OS is present and Smart Array SAS controller (embedded or otherwise) is the primary controller.

(ii) If this part number is selected, then at least 1 hard drive must be on the order.

(iii) If this part number is selected, then preinstalled OS must be on the order.
RAID Settings.RuleDescription2:
A Customer Intent Document must be supplied if this part number is ordered. 
This Customer Intent Document should include all details about the desired RAID custom configuration.  (  This includes drive part #s and quantities, RAID levels desired, which drives should be applied to each RAID level, and if a preinstalled OS has been ordered - which RAID set it should be installed on )
RAID Settings.RuleDescription3:
Warning message to be displayed in the configurators if "HPE Customer Defined RAID Setti ALL" is selected with one Internal controller.
HPE Recommends to use below standard RAID Settings,
 - 339777-B21 - HPE RAID 0 Drive 1 FIO Setting 
 - 339778-B21 - HPE RAID 1 Drive 1 FIO Setting
 - 339779-B21 - HPE RAID 5 Drive 1 FIO Setting
 - 339780-B21 - HPE RAID 5 w/SP Drive 1 FIO Setting
 - 339781-B21 - HPE Raid Adv Data Guarding FIO
RAID Settings.RuleDescription4: If RAID is being selected in a configuration with VROC and internal controller, then Customer Defined RAID Setting (389692-B21) must be selected.

Trusted Supply Chain.RuleDescription1: If "HPE Trusted Supply Chain FIO Config" is selected, then "Gen11 Intrusion Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
Trusted Supply Chain.RuleDescription2: If HPE Trusted Supply Chain FIO Config is selected, then Configurator should default 1Qty of "HPE iLO Adv 1-svr Lic 3yr Support" and customer will be allowed to deselect.
Trusted Supply Chain.RuleDescription3:
If HPE Trusted Supply Chain FIO Config is selected, configurator to display the following Warning Message: 
"Logistics delivery speeds/services are available, please select within NGQ"
Trusted Supply Chain.RuleDescription4: If "HPE Trusted Supply Chain FIO Config" is selected then HPE Trusted Supply Chain E-LTU Software is required per order (not per server).
Trusted Supply Chain.RuleDescription5: If HPE Trusted Supply Chain FIO Config is selected then Configurator should default Trusted Supply Chain E-LTU Software.
Trusted Supply Chain.RuleDescription6:
Display the following note for the Trusted Supply Chain section in OCA Menu view:

"If Trusted Supply Chain section is selected, only one instance of the following E-LTU software option is required per order (not per server): 
HPE Trusted Supply Chain E-LTU."

vSAN Tracking SKUs.vSAN Tracking SKUs: HPE ProLiant for vSAN RN ESA FIO Trk

INTEL VROC Products.RuleDescription1: If Premium VROC is the primary controller, then the following RAID levels are allowed: 0, 1, 5.
INTEL VROC Products.RuleDescription2: Requires selection of NVMe Drives (SFF/ EDSFF) through Direct Attach
INTEL VROC Products.RuleDescription3: Supported with 8SFF/ Hybrid CTO Server only.
INTEL VROC Products.RuleDescription4: If RAID is being selected in a configuration with VROC and internal controller, then Customer Defined RAID Setting (389692-B21) must be selected.

Riser Cards.RuleDescription1: If DLC Module is selected, then "Secondary LP Riser" must be selected and be defaulted.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription2: If Secondary riser is selected, then 2 Processor must be selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription3: If Secondary riser is not selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is not selected, then maximum 2 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription4: If Secondary riser is not selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is selected, then maximum 1 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription5: If Secondary LP riser is selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is not selected, then maximum 3 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription6: If Secondary LP riser and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" are selected, then maximum 2 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.

Riser Cards.AdditionalInfo:
*Referred as Secondary FH riser
Slot 3: 1x PCIe5.0 x16 FH
Riser Cards.RuleDescription1: If "DLC Module" is selected, then "Secondary FH Riser" cannot be selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription2: If Secondary riser is selected, then 2 Processor must be selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription3: If Secondary riser is not selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is not selected, then maximum 2 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription4: If Secondary FH riser is not selected, then maximum 1 quantity of FH PCIe cards can selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription5: If Secondary riser is not selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is selected, then maximum 1 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription6: If Secondary FH riser is selected, then maximum 2 quantity of PCIe cards can be selected.
Riser Cards.RuleDescription7: If Secondary FH riser is selected, then "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" cannot be selected.

Applicable when 30C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC tracking

If Closed Loop Liquid cooling is selected with selective high-speed Networking/ InfiniBand (>=100G), then Drive cage cannot be selected.

Ethernet OCP.RuleDescription1: Minimum One card (PCIe or OCP) must be selected from Networking category.
Ethernet OCP.RuleDescription2:
If Networking/ InfiniBand that is 100G or more, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid Cooling Heatsink or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling or DLC Module
Ethernet OCP.RuleDescription3: If 256GB DIMM is selected without DLC Module, then high speed Networking/ InfiniBand card (PCIe and OCP) that is 100G or more cannot be selected.
Ethernet OCP.RuleDescription4:
Only display the compatible/ supported transceiver and hide the remaining Transceiver.

Supported Transceivers are:
845966-B21  HPE 100Gb QSFP28 MPO SR4 100m Transceiver
Ethernet OCP.RuleDescription5:
If One quantity of x16 OCP card is selected, then one of "CPU1 to OCPA x16" or "CPU2 to OCPB x16" enablement kit must be selected.

Configurator to default "CPU1 to OCPA x16" and allow customer to remove and select "CPU2 to OCPB x16".
Ethernet OCP.RuleDescription6:
If Two quantity of x16 OCP card is selected, then both "CPU1 to OCPA x16" and "CPU2 to OCPB x16" enablement kit must be selected.

Configurator to default "CPU1 to OCPA x16" and "CPU2 to OCPB x16".

Upgrades.Upgrades: HPE DL3XX/ML350 G12 CPU1/OCPAx16 Cbl Kit
Upgrades.AdditionalInfo: CPU1 to OCPA x16 Enablement kit
Upgrades.RuleDescription1:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 1 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage and 2 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection :
If no controller is selected and 1 Processor is selected, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 1 qty of P76501-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P77190-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B2 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72605-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 2SFF x4 P1 B4/5 Cbl Kit

* Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.

* * Below OCP Enablement kit cannot be selected.
P72201-B21 HPE DL3XX/ML350 G12 CPU1/OCPAx16 Cbl Kit 
P72203-B21 HPE DL3XX/ML350 G12 CPU1/OCPB x8 Cbl Kit
Upgrades.RuleDescription2:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage and 1 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection :
If no controller is selected and 1 Processor is selected, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 1 qty of P76501-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72213-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF P2 B1/P1 B4 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72605-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 2SFF x4 P1 B4/5 Cbl Kit

* Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.

* * Below OCP Enablement kit cannot be selected.
P72201-B21 HPE DL3XX/ML350 G12 CPU1/OCPAx16 Cbl Kit 
P72203-B21 HPE DL3XX/ML350 G12 CPU1/OCPB x8 Cbl Kit
Upgrades.RuleDescription3:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage and 1 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection:
If there is no controller selected, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P72211-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 CPU1 B1/2 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P77191-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P2 B2 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P76504-B21 HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF x4 P1 P2 B4 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P76505-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B5 Cbl Kit

OS Boot Device.OS Boot Device: HPE DL360 Gen12 NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription1:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected with one quantity of "P76506-B21  HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF MRx16 PCIe B1 Cbl Kit", then "HPE DL360 Gen12 NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" cannot be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription2: If Secondary riser is not selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is not selected, then maximum 2 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription3: If Secondary riser is not selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is selected, then maximum 1 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription4: If Secondary LP riser is selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is not selected, then maximum 3 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription5: If Secondary LP riser and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" are selected, then maximum 2 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription6: If NS204i-u is selected, then either NS204i-u Front or Internal or Rear Enable must be selected and vice versa.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription7:
Max 1 of below NS204i-u enablement kit can be selected:
* NS204i-u Front 
* NS204i-u Internal
* NS204i-u Rear
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription8: If Secondary FH riser is selected, then "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" cannot be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription9:
8SFF CTO Server:
Applicable when 30C Ambient Temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Rear NS204i-u, then 2SFF x4 Drive cage/ HPE DL3XX G12 1U DP/USB/ODD Enable Kit cannot be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription10:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 30C Ambient Temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Rear NS204i-u, then Maximum 4 quantity of 2SFF Stacking Drive cage can be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription11:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 30C Ambient Temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Performance Heatsink is selected with Rear NS204i-u, then Maximum 4 quantity of 4EDSFF Drive cage can be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription12:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 23C Ambient Temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If 350W Processor is selected with Rear NS204i-u and 5 quantity of 4EDSFF Drive cage, then DLC Module must be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription13:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 25C Ambient Temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Rear NS204i-u, then Maximum 2 quantity of 4EDSFF Drive cage can be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription14:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 27C/ 30C Ambient Temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Rear NS204i-u, then Maximum 1 quantity of 4EDSFF Drive cage can be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription15:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 30C Ambient Temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Rear NS204i-u and 4EDSFF Drive Cage, then 350W Processor cannot be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription16: If 2 quantity of PCIe controllers are selected, then Rear NS204i-u cannot be selected

OS Boot Device.OS Boot Device: HPE DL360 G12 NS204i-u Int Enable Kit
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription1: If NS204i-u is selected, then either NS204i-u Front or Internal or Rear Enable must be selected and vice versa.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription2:
Max 1 of below NS204i-u enablement kit can be selected:
* NS204i-u Front 
* NS204i-u Internal
* NS204i-u Rear

OS Boot Device.OS Boot Device: HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription1:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Max 5 quantity of below cages can be selected:
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U 4EDSFF NVMe Stck BP Kit
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U 2SFF x4 TM Stck BP Kit 
 - HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit
 - HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription2:
Hybrid CTO Server: 
If "HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit" is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit" cannot be selected.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription3:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 2 qty of MR416i-p/ MR216i-p controller is selected, then below options cannot be selected

 - "HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit"
 - "HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit"
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription4:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 1 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage and 2 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection :
If no controller is selected in 1P configuration, then below options cannot be selected

 - "HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit"
 - "HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit"
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription5:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage and 1 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection :
If no controller is selected and 1 Processor is selected, then then below options cannot be selected

 - "HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit"
 - "HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit"
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription6:
Hybrid CTO Server:
If the total quantity of 2SFF Stacking and 4EDSFF Drive cage is more than 3, then below options cannot be selected. 

 - "HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit"
 - "HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit"
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription7: If NS204i-u is selected, then either NS204i-u Front or Internal or Rear Enable must be selected and vice versa.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription8:
Max 1 of below NS204i-u enablement kit can be selected:
* NS204i-u Front 
* NS204i-u Internal
* NS204i-u Rear
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription9:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without "HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit" and 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If the below cable kits are selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit" cannot be selected.

 - 1 qty of P76502-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P2 B1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P77191-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P2 B2 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P76505-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B5 Cbl Kit
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription10:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 1 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage and 2 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection :
If "P76505-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B5 Cbl Kit" is selected without controller in 2P configuration, then "HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit" cannot be selected.

OS Boot Device.OS Boot Device: HPE NS204i-u V2 Ht Plg Boot Opt Dev
OS Boot Device.AdditionalInfo: NS204i-u V2 Hot Pluggable Boot Device
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription1:
If NS204i-u is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling or DLC Module
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription2: If NS204i-u is selected, then either NS204i-u Front or Internal or Rear Enable must be selected and vice versa.
OS Boot Device.RuleDescription3: Max 1 of NS204i-u can be selected.

SAS.SAS: HPE MR416i-p Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr
SAS.AdditionalInfo: PCIe 4.0 x8 // HH/HL; 2 Ports; Supports up to 16 SAS/ SATA/ NVMe Drives
SAS.RuleDescription1: If there is no controller or cable or LFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription2:
If any controller or cable or 4LFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if controller or cable or LFF drive is selected.
SAS.RuleDescription3: If there is no 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription4:
If any 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if 8SFF drive cage or controller or cable or SFF drive is selected.
SAS.RuleDescription5:
If 8SFF Drive cage is selected, then one controller must be selected with any one of the below cable kits.

 - HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit
 - HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit
SAS.RuleDescription6:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection without 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If any one of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p controller is selected, then "HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription7:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection without 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
Maximum 1 quantity of MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR216i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR416i-p controller can be selected
SAS.RuleDescription8:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o is selected without MR216i-p/ MR416i-p, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit"must be selected and be defaulted.

User is allowed to remove "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" and select "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS DA Pwr Cbl Kit".
SAS.RuleDescription9:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected without MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o, then "HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.

User is allowed to remove "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit" and select "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS DA Pwr Cbl Kit".
SAS.RuleDescription10:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected with MR216i-p/ MR416i-p, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit"must be selected and be defaulted.

If User removes these cable, then "HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" must be selected and defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription11:
8SFF CTO Server: 
If 8SFF x1 Drive cage is selected with 2SFF x4 Drive cage, then Maximum 1 of PCIe and Maximum 1 of OROC controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription12:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected, then one quantity of "P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit" or "P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit" must be selected.

Configurator to default "P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit". Customer is allowed to remove "P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit" and select "P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit".

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription13:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected, then Maximum one of the below cable can be selected. Both cannot be selected.

 - P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
SAS.RuleDescription14:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
Maximum of One MR216i-p/ MR416i-p/ MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription15:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected, then one quantity of "P76506-B21  HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF MRx16 PCIe B1 Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription16:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected with one quantity of "P76506-B21  HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF MRx16 PCIe B1 Cbl Kit", then "HPE DL360 Gen12 NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription17:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
Maximum of One MR216i-p/ MR416i-p controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription18:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected without any other controller, then below cable kits cannot be selected together.

 - P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
SAS.RuleDescription19:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 2 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected without any other controller, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P76506-B21 HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF MRx16 PCIe B1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P76507-B21 HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF MRx16 PCIe B5 Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription20:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected, then 2 qty of the controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription21:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected without any other controller, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72601-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF P2 B2/P1 B3/5 Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription22:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p (And) 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o /MR408i-o is selected, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription23:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If Maximum 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p and 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o /MR408i-o can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription24:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 2 qty of MR416i-p/ MR216i-p controller is selected, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 1 qty of P76506-B21 HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF MRx16 PCIe B1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P77192-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B3 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P76507-B21 HPE DL360 G12 4EDSFF MRx16 PCIe B5 Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription25:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 2 qty of MR416i-p/ MR216i-p controller is selected, then below options cannot be selected

 - "HPE DL3XX G12 SFF/EDSFF DP/USB/ODD Kit"
 - "HPE DL3XX G12 1U NS204 Front Enable Kit"
SAS.RuleDescription26:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR416i-p/ MR216i-p controller is selection is not allowed. Total controller quantity must be 2.
SAS.RuleDescription27:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 4 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If one quantity of MR216i-p/ MR426i-p controller is selected without any other controller, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P77188-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B4 B5 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription28:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 4 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
Maximum One controller (MR216i-o/ MR216i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR416-p) can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription29:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 4 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p AND 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controllers are selected in 1P configuration, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P76501-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P77190-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B2 Cbl Kit
 - 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - 2 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription30:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 4 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p AND 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controllers are selected in 2P configuration, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P76502-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P2 B1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P77191-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P2 B2 Cbl Kit
 - 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - 2 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription31:
If LFF drive is selected, then controller must be selected.

Configurator to default MR216i-o. User is allowed to remove MR216i-o and select any other controller
SAS.RuleDescription32: If SFF SATA/ SAS drive is selected, then controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription33: If "HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery" is selected, then MR416/ MR408 controller does not require selection of Battery.
SAS.RuleDescription34: If "HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery" is selected, then MR416/ MR408 controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription35: If MR416i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is the Primary controller, then all RAID levels are allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription36: If both 4Port BASE-T Networking (Base-T and Full-Height) and Half-Height Internal PCIe controller are selected, then Secondary FH riser cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription37:
For 4LFF CTO Model:
If PCIe controller is selected with LFF drive, then "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted
SAS.RuleDescription38:
For 4LFF CTO Model:
Max 1 of controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription39: If any of these controller is selected, then "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" or "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl" must be selected and vice versa. "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" to be defaulted and customer is allowed to remove and select "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl".
SAS.RuleDescription40:
8SFF CTO Model:
If controller is selected, then Drive cage must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription41: If "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" is selected, then PCIe controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription42: If "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit" is selected, then 2SFF x4 drive cage and MR216i-p/ MR416i-p controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription43: If 2 quantity of PCIe controllers are selected, then Rear NS204i-u cannot be selected

SAS.SAS: HPE MR416i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr
SAS.AdditionalInfo: OROC - OCP; 2 Ports; Supports up to 16 SAS/ SATA/ NVMe Drives
SAS.RuleDescription1: If there is no controller or cable or LFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription2:
If any controller or cable or 4LFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if controller or cable or LFF drive is selected.
SAS.RuleDescription3: If there is no 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription4:
If any 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if 8SFF drive cage or controller or cable or SFF drive is selected.
SAS.RuleDescription5:
If 8SFF Drive cage is selected, then one controller must be selected with any one of the below cable kits.

 - HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit
 - HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit
SAS.RuleDescription6:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection without 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If any one of MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller is selected, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription7:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection without 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
Maximum 1 quantity of MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR216i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR416i-p controller can be selected
SAS.RuleDescription8:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o is selected without MR216i-p/ MR416i-p, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit"must be selected and be defaulted.

User is allowed to remove "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" and select "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS DA Pwr Cbl Kit".
SAS.RuleDescription9:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected without MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o, then "HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.

User is allowed to remove "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit" and select "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS DA Pwr Cbl Kit".
SAS.RuleDescription10:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected with MR216i-p/ MR416i-p, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit"must be selected and be defaulted.

If User removes these cable, then "HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" must be selected and defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription11:
8SFF CTO Server: 
If 8SFF x1 Drive cage is selected with 2SFF x4 Drive cage, then Maximum 1 of PCIe and Maximum 1 of OROC controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription12:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected, then one quantity of "P72600-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x2 B1 B2 OCPA Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription13:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
Maximum of One MR216i-p/ MR416i-p/ MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription14:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription15:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected without any other controller, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P72600-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x2 B1 B2 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription16:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p is selected without any other controller, then 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit or 1 qty of P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit must be selected.

Configurator to default to 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit. User is allowed to remove and select 1 qty of P72604-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF B1 B2 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit.

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription17:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription18:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected without any other controller in 1P configuration, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 2 qty of P72211-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 CPU1 B1/2 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription19:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected without any other controller in 2P configuration, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 1 qty of P72213-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF P2 B1/P1 B4 Cbl Kit
