 - 1 qty of P72601-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF P2 B2/P1 B3/5 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription19:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p (And) 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o /MR408i-o is selected, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription20:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If Maximum 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p and 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o /MR408i-o can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription21:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR416i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR408i-o controller cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription22:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 4 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If one quantity of MR216i-o/ MR426i-o controller is selected without any other controller, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P72600-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x2 B1 B2 OCPA Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P76500-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x2 B4 B5 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription23:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 4 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
Maximum One controller (MR216i-o/ MR216i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR416-p) can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription24:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 4 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p AND 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controllers are selected in 1P configuration, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P76501-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P77190-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B2 Cbl Kit
 - 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - 2 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription25:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 4 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p AND 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controllers are selected in 2P configuration, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P76502-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P2 B1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P77191-B21 HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P2 B2 Cbl Kit
 - 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - 2 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription26:
If LFF drive is selected, then controller must be selected.

Configurator to default MR216i-o. User is allowed to remove MR216i-o and select any other controller
SAS.RuleDescription27: If SFF SATA/ SAS drive is selected, then controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription28: If MR216i-o/MR216i-p is the primary controller, then only following RAID levels are allowed: 0, 1
SAS.RuleDescription29:
If Two quantity of OCP card is selected, then "CPU1 to OCPB x8" or "CPU2 to OCPB x8" enablement kit must be selected.

Configurator to default "CPU1 to OCPB x8" and allow customer to remove and select "CPU2 to OCPB x8".
SAS.RuleDescription30:
For 4LFF CTO Model:
If OROC controller is selected with LFF drive, then "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted
SAS.RuleDescription31:
For 4LFF CTO Model:
Max 1 of controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription32:
8SFF CTO Model:
If controller is selected, then Drive cage must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription33: If "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" is selected, then OROC controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription34: If "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" is selected, then 2SFF x4 drive cage and OROC controller must be selected.

SAS.SAS: HPE MR408i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr
SAS.AdditionalInfo: OROC - OCP; 1 Port; Supports up to 8 SAS/ SATA/ NVMe Drives
SAS.RuleDescription1: If there is no controller or cable or LFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription2:
If any controller or cable or 4LFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if controller or cable or LFF drive is selected.
SAS.RuleDescription3: If there is no 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription4:
If any 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if 8SFF drive cage or controller or cable or SFF drive is selected.
SAS.RuleDescription5:
If 8SFF Drive cage is selected, then one controller must be selected with any one of the below cable kits.

 - HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit
 - HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit
SAS.RuleDescription6:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection without 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If any one of MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller is selected, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription7:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection without 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
Maximum 1 quantity of MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR216i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR416i-p controller can be selected
SAS.RuleDescription8:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR408i-o is the only controller selected, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS DA Pwr Cbl Kit"must be selected and be defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription9:
For 8SFF x1 Drive cage selection with 2SFF x4 Drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected with MR216i-p/ MR416i-p, then "HPE DL360 G12 8SFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit"must be selected and be defaulted.

If User removes these cable, then "HPE DL360 G12 x1 8SFF PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" and "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" must be selected and defaulted.
SAS.RuleDescription10:
8SFF CTO Server: 
If 8SFF x1 Drive cage is selected with 2SFF x4 Drive cage, then Maximum 1 of PCIe and Maximum 1 of OROC controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription11:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected, then one quantity of "P72600-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x2 B1 B2 OCPA Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription12:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 2SFF x4 Stacking selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
Maximum of One MR216i-p/ MR416i-p/ MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription13:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For One quantity of 4EDSFF selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription14:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected without any other controller, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:
 - 1 qty of P72600-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x2 B1 B2 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription15:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 2 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
MR408i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR416i-o controller cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription16:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected without any other controller in 1P configuration, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 2 qty of P72211-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 CPU1 B1/2 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription17:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is selected without any other controller in 2P configuration, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 1 qty of P72213-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF P2 B1/P1 B4 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72601-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF P2 B2/P1 B3/5 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription18:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p (And) 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o /MR408i-o is selected, then below cable kits must be selected and be defaulted:

 - 2 qty of P72602-B21 HPE DL360 G12 B1/2/3 PCIe S1 Cbl Kit
 - 1 qty of P72603-B21 HPE DL360 G12 2SFF x4 Box3 OCPA Cbl Kit

Other cable kits listed in Controller->cable cannot be selected. For the selected cables, any other quantity apart from the mentioned one in the rule is not allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription19:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage without 4EDSFF drive cage selection:
If Maximum 1 qty of MR216i-p/ MR416i-p and 1 qty of MR216i-o/ MR416i-o /MR408i-o can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription20:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 3 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selection without 2SFF Stacking drive cage:
If 1 qty of MR416i-o/ MR216i-o/ MR408i-o controller cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription21:
Hybrid CTO Server:
For 4 quantity of 2SFF Stacking drive cage selection without 4EDSFF drive cage:
MR408i-o controller cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription22:
Hybrid CTO Server:
If 4 quantity of 4EDSFF drive cage selected without 2SFF Stacking drive cage and without any controller, then MR408i-o controller cannot be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription23:
If LFF drive is selected, then controller must be selected.

Configurator to default MR216i-o. User is allowed to remove MR216i-o and select any other controller
SAS.RuleDescription24: If SFF SATA/ SAS drive is selected, then controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription25: If "HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery" is selected, then MR416/ MR408 controller does not require selection of Battery.
SAS.RuleDescription26: If "HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery" is selected, then MR416/ MR408 controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription27: If MR416i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is the Primary controller, then all RAID levels are allowed.
SAS.RuleDescription28:
If Two quantity of OCP card is selected, then "CPU1 to OCPB x8" or "CPU2 to OCPB x8" enablement kit must be selected.

Configurator to default "CPU1 to OCPB x8" and allow customer to remove and select "CPU2 to OCPB x8".
SAS.RuleDescription29:
For 4LFF CTO Model:
If OROC controller is selected with LFF drive, then "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted
SAS.RuleDescription30:
For 4LFF CTO Model:
Max 1 of controller can be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription31: If any of these controller is selected, then "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" or "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl" must be selected and vice versa. "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" to be defaulted and customer is allowed to remove and select "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl".
SAS.RuleDescription32:
8SFF CTO Model:
If controller is selected, then Drive cage must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription33: If "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" is selected, then OROC controller must be selected.
SAS.RuleDescription34: If "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" is selected, then 2SFF x4 drive cage and OROC controller must be selected.

Upgrade.Upgrade: HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit
Upgrade.RuleDescription1: If "HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery" is selected, then Battery/ capacity cannot be selected.
Upgrade.RuleDescription2: If any of these controller is selected, then "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" or "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl" must be selected and vice versa. "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" to be defaulted and customer is allowed to remove and select "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl".
Upgrade.RuleDescription3:
If "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" or "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl" is selected, then "HPE DL360 Gen11 Stg Cntrl Enable Cbl Kit" must be selected and Vice versa.

Configurator to default "HPE DL360 Gen11 Stg Cntrl Enable Cbl Kit" upon the Battery/ Capacitor selection.
Upgrade.RuleDescription4: Max 1 of Storage Battery can be selected.
Upgrade.RuleDescription5:
BTO/ Standalone behavior (CLIC Error only):
The Configuration has exceeded maximum quantity of 96W Smart Storage Battery (P01366-B21) per Line item, the max allowed per Line Item is 80.  Please adjust accordingly”

Upgrade.Upgrade: HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl
Upgrade.RuleDescription1: If "HPE FIO No Smart Storage Battery" is selected, then Battery/ capacity cannot be selected.
Upgrade.RuleDescription2: If any of these controller is selected, then "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" or "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl" must be selected and vice versa. "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" to be defaulted and customer is allowed to remove and select "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl".
Upgrade.RuleDescription3:
If "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" or "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl" is selected, then "HPE DL360 Gen11 Stg Cntrl Enable Cbl Kit" must be selected and Vice versa.

Configurator to default "HPE DL360 Gen11 Stg Cntrl Enable Cbl Kit" upon the Battery/ Capacitor selection.
Upgrade.RuleDescription4: Max 1 of Storage Battery can be selected.

Upgrade.Upgrade: HPE DL360 Gen11 Stg Cntrl Enable Cbl Kit
Upgrade.AdditionalInfo: Extension Cable for Storage Battery/ Capacitor
Upgrade.RuleDescription1:
If "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" or "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl" is selected, then "HPE DL360 Gen11 Stg Cntrl Enable Cbl Kit" must be selected and Vice versa.

Configurator to default "HPE DL360 Gen11 Stg Cntrl Enable Cbl Kit" upon the Battery/ Capacitor selection.
Upgrade.RuleDescription2: Max 1 of Storage Battery cable kit can be selected per server.

Graphics Options.AdditionalInfo: PCIe Gen4 x16 // HH/HL or LP // 24GB, Single Wide
Graphics Options.RuleDescription1: Mixing of different Graphics Option is not allowed.
Graphics Options.RuleDescription2:
If GPU is selected then below Warning message to be dispalyed in OCA and CLIC: 
"For best performance across common workloads, HPE recommends system main memory at least twice the memory of all GPU."
Graphics Options.RuleDescription3:
If Graphics Option is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling ot DLC Module
Graphics Options.RuleDescription4: If Graphics Option is selected, then 256GB DIMM cannot be selected.
Graphics Options.RuleDescription5:
4LFF CTO Server:
Applicable when 27C/ 30C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected, then Graphics Option cannot be selected.
Graphics Options.RuleDescription6:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 23C/ 25C Ambient temperature  tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Graphics Option, then Maximum 4 quantity of 2SFF Stacking Drive cage can be selected.
Graphics Options.RuleDescription7:
8SFF CTO Server:
Applicable when 23C/ 25C Ambient temperature  tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Graphics Option, then 2SFF x4 Drive cage/  HPE DL3XX G12 1U DP/USB/ODD Enable Kit cannot be selected.
Graphics Options.RuleDescription8:
8SFF CTO Server:
Applicable when 27C/ 30C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Graphics Option, then Drive cage cannot be selected.
Graphics Options.RuleDescription9:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 27C/ 30C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected, then Graphics Option cannot be selected.
Graphics Options.RuleDescription10:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 30C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Standard/ Performance Heatsink is selected with Graphics Option, then Maximum 4 quantity of 4EDSFF Drive cage can be selected.
Graphics Options.RuleDescription11:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when 23C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Graphics Option, then Maximum 3 quantity of 4EDSFF Drive cage can be selected.
Graphics Options.RuleDescription12:
Hybrid CTO Server:
Applicable when >23C Ambient temperature tracking is selected with AOC/ DAC tracking:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with Graphics Option, then 4EDSFF Drive cage cannot be selected.

Cooling Options.Cooling Options: HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U Stnd Fan Kit
Cooling Options.RuleDescription1:
If the selected Processor Wattage is less than or equal to 185W, then "Standard Heatsink and Standard Fan" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected. 

Configurator to default "Standard Heatsink" and "Standard Fan" upon Processor selection. But Customer is allowed to remove and select "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan"
Cooling Options.RuleDescription2: If "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" is selected, then Fan cannot be selected.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription3: If Performance Heatsink is selected, then Standard fan cannot be selected.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription4: If Standard Heatsink is selected in 1 Processor configuration, then "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U Stnd Fan Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription5: If Standard Heatsink is selected in 2 Processor configuration, then both "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U Stnd Fan Kit" and "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription6: If "DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" is selected, then "DL3X0 Gen11 1U Std Fan Kit" should also be selected and be defaulted.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription7: If 2 Processor is selected with "DL3X0 Gen11 1U Std Fan Kit", then "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" must be selected.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription8: Max 1 of each can be selected. However Performance Fan cannot be selected with Standard Fan kits.

Cooling Options.Cooling Options: HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U High Perf Fan Kit
Cooling Options.RuleDescription1:
If the selected Processor Wattage is less than or equal to 185W, then "Standard Heatsink and Standard Fan" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected. 

Configurator to default "Standard Heatsink" and "Standard Fan" upon Processor selection. But Customer is allowed to remove and select "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan"
Cooling Options.RuleDescription2:
If the selected Processor Wattage is more than 185W and less than or equal to 270W, then "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected.
 
Configurator to default "Performance Heatsink" and "Performance Fan" upon Processor selection. But customer should be allowed to remove and select "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling".
Cooling Options.RuleDescription3: If "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" is selected, then Fan cannot be selected.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription4: If Standard Heatsink is selected, then Performance fan cannot be selected.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription5: If Performance Heatsink or DLC Module is selected, then Performance Fan must be selected and be defaulted. vice versa
Cooling Options.RuleDescription6: Max 1 of each can be selected. However Performance Fan cannot be selected with Standard Fan kits.

Cooling Options.Cooling Options: HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit
Cooling Options.RuleDescription1:
If the selected Processor Wattage is less than or equal to 185W, then "Standard Heatsink and Standard Fan" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected. 

Configurator to default "Standard Heatsink" and "Standard Fan" upon Processor selection. But Customer is allowed to remove and select "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan"
Cooling Options.RuleDescription2:
If the selected Processor Wattage is more than 185W and less than or equal to 270W, then "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected.
 
Configurator to default "Performance Heatsink" and "Performance Fan" upon Processor selection. But customer should be allowed to remove and select "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling".
Cooling Options.RuleDescription3: If "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" is selected, then Fan cannot be selected.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription4: If Performance Heatsink is selected, then Standard fan cannot be selected.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription5: If Standard Heatsink is selected in 2 Processor configuration, then both "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U Stnd Fan Kit" and "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription6: If "DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" is selected, then "DL3X0 Gen11 1U Std Fan Kit" should also be selected and be defaulted.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription7: If "DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" is selected, then 2 Processor must be selected.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription8: If 2 Processor is selected with "DL3X0 Gen11 1U Std Fan Kit", then "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" must be selected.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription9: Max 1 of each can be selected. However Performance Fan cannot be selected with Standard Fan kits.

Cooling Options.Cooling Options: HPE DL3XX Gen11 DLC 45cm QD Tube FIO Kit
Cooling Options.RuleDescription1: Min/ Max is not applicable. However Maximum One quantity of Tubeset can be selected per server.
Cooling Options.RuleDescription2: If DLC Module is selected, then "HPE DL3XX Gen11 DLC 45cm QD Tube FIO Kit" must be selected and vice versa.

Power Supplies.Power Supplies: HPE 1000W FS Ti Ht Plg PS Kit
Power Supplies.RuleDescription1: Mixing of different Power supply SKU is not allowed.
Power Supplies.RuleDescription2:
Warning to be displayed in the Configurator upon selection:
In order to select the right size power supply for your ProLiant Server it is highly recommended to use "HPE Power Advisor" located at "https://poweradvisorext.it.hpe.com/?Page=Index".
Power Supplies.RuleDescription3:
For non-EU countries:
If a Lot 9 compliant power supply is configured, then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" cannot be selected.

Power Supplies.Power Supplies: HPE 1600W FS -48VDC Ht Plg PS Kit
Power Supplies.RuleDescription1: Mixing of different Power supply SKU is not allowed.
Power Supplies.RuleDescription2:
Warning to be displayed in the Configurator upon selection:
In order to select the right size power supply for your ProLiant Server it is highly recommended to use "HPE Power Advisor" located at "https://poweradvisorext.it.hpe.com/?Page=Index".
Power Supplies.RuleDescription3:
For non-EU countries:
If a Lot 9 compliant power supply is configured, then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" cannot be selected.
Power Supplies.RuleDescription4: If 1600W DC Power supply is selected, then either "HPE 1600W DC PSU Power Cable Kit" or "HPE 1600W DC PSU Power Lug Option Kit" must be selected and quantity must match. vice versa

Power Supplies.Power Supplies: HPE 800W FS Plat Ht Plg LH PS Kit
Power Supplies.RuleDescription1:
For EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1) and "HPE OEM FIO Approved Server Appliance" is not selected, then CLIC should trigger below UNB:
"This system does not meet the EU Lot9 energy efficiency requirements and cannot be put into service, installed, or supplied in the EU. 96% efficient (Titanium) FlexSlot power supply is mandated to meet the Lot9 requirements."
Power Supplies.RuleDescription2:
For non-EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1), then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" must be defaulted in configurator.
Power Supplies.RuleDescription3:
For non-EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1) and "HPE OEM FIO Approved Server Appliance" is not selected, then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" must be selected and be defaulted. 
If the "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" is not selected in this scenario, then Configurator RED ERROR/ CLIC UNB must be triggered with the below message. 
"This system does not meet the EU Lot9 energy efficiency requirements and cannot be put into service, installed, or supplied in the EU. 96% efficient (Titanium) FlexSlot power supply is mandated to meet the Lot9 requirements."
Power Supplies.RuleDescription4: Mixing of different Power supply SKU is not allowed.
Power Supplies.RuleDescription5:
Warning to be displayed in the Configurator upon selection:
In order to select the right size power supply for your ProLiant Server it is highly recommended to use "HPE Power Advisor" located at "https://poweradvisorext.it.hpe.com/?Page=Index".
Power Supplies.RuleDescription6:
For EU countries:
- These power supply SKUs are non-compliant in EU countries and should be hidden in the configurator.
Power Supplies.RuleDescription7: If "HPE Energy Star4.0 configuration FIO kit" selected, then these Power Supply cannot be selected and to be hidden.

RulesDescription.RulesDesc: Rules:
Must select Processor, Memory and Power Supply.
Minimum One card (PCIe or OCP) must be selected from Networking category.
"BCM 5719 1Gb 4p BASE-T OCP Adptr" to be defaulted in the configurator. Customer is allowed to remove and select other cards (PCIe of OCP) from Networking category.
If the CTO Server is selected with Rack, then "HPE DL3XX Gen11 Easy Install Rail 3 Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
If the CTO Server is selected with Rack, then "HPE Easy Install Rail 5 Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
Supported Rail kit to be defaulted for CTO Server in the configurator. But customer can deselect the Rail kit if the CTO Server is selected without Rack (Standalone server).

Hybrid CTO Server:
Prioritization list for Primary controller selection is as follows:

 - HPE MR416i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR416i-p Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr
 - HPE MR408i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR216i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR216i-p Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - VROC
 - Direct Attach (Supports NVMe only)

8SFF CTO Server:
Prioritization list for Primary controller selection is as follows:

 - HPE MR416i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR416i-p Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr
 - HPE MR408i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR216i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR216i-p Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - VROC

4LFF CTO Models:
Prioritization list for Primary controller selection is as follows:

 - HPE MR416i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR416i-p Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr
 - HPE MR408i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR216i-o Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr 
 - HPE MR216i-p Gen11 SPDM Storage Cntlr

Warning to be displayed in the configurator upon selection:
“Some TAA SKUs are fulfilled by manufacturing plants in the Americas Region, ordering from countries outside this region will experience extended lead times. Please consult locally upon configuring.”

OCA RED ERROR/ CLIC UNB with below message If DLC server (ie, with DLC CPM, Tubeset) is selected without supported DLC rack.

"DL3XX Gen12 DLC support requires at least one liquid cooling infrastructure items as follows: 
HPE Rack in 800mmx1200mm, Rack Manifold, CDU, Primary Hose Kit and Secondary Hose Kit in order to function. Without above rack infrastructure to be selected, an unbuildable configuration will be triggered in this order.

Rack 42U 800mm x 1200mm Ent G2 (applicable for ProLiant Gen12 DL3XX DLC)
Rack 48U 800mm x 1200mm Ent G2 (applicable for ProLiant Gen12 DL3XX DLC)"
If there is no controller or cable or LFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.

If any controller or cable or 4LFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if controller or cable or LFF drive is selected.
If there is no 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" must be selected and be defaulted.

If any 8SFF drive cage, controller, cable, SFF drive is selected, then "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" cannot be selected.

Configurator to remove "HPE DL3XX G12 No Drive Ctrl FIO Trig Set" if 8SFF drive cage or controller or cable or SFF drive is selected.

For Hybrid CTO Server:

Configurator behviour on Smart Chassis:

* User need to select the below items and configurator to display the Smart Chassis naming/ ID based on the selection
 - Appropriate Ambient temperature
 - Drive cage
 - Controller
* Once the above selections are completed, configurator to show the relevant Smart Chassis naming/ ID for the customer based on Smart Chassis Matrix.
* After user selects the Smart Chassis naming/ ID, configurator will show actual Menu view (Processor, Memory..etc.,) 
* Ambient temperature SKUs are listed in "Ambient Temperature" category.
* Smart Chassis comprises of allowed Drive cage combinations along with controller and/ or Direct Attach connectivity.
* OCA to default the selected Drive cage, controller and the required Cable kits in the OCA Menu view this is based on preselect questions for Smart Chassis. Cables should NOT be allowed to change from the preselected option.


If User opts for HPE Preferred default in the Smart Chassis, configurator to default the below components:
* 2 quantity of 2SFF Stacking Drive cage
* 2 quantity of 4EDSFF Drive cage
* 1 quantity of MR416i-p controller
* 30C Ampient Temperature and DAC tracking

For 8SFF CTO Server:

Configurator behviour on Smart Chassis:

* User need to select the below items and configurator to display the Smart Chassis naming/ ID based on the selection
 - Appropriate Ambient temperature
 - Drive cage
 - Controller
* Once the above selections are completed, configurator to show the relevant Smart Chassis naming/ ID for the customer based on Smart Chassis Matrix.
* After user selects the Smart Chassis naming/ ID, configurator will show actual Menu view (Processor, Memory..etc.,) 
* Ambient temperature SKUs are listed in "Ambient Temperature" category.
* Smart Chassis comprises of allowed Drive cage combinations along with controller and/ or Direct Attach connectivity.
* OCA to default the selected Drive cage, controller and the required Cable kits in the OCA Menu view this is based on preselect questions for Smart Chassis. Cables should NOT be allowed to change from the preselected option.


If User opts for HPE Preferred default in the Smart Chassis, configurator to default the below components:
* 1 quantity of 8SFF x1 Drive cage
* 1 quantity of MR408i-o controller
* 30C Ampient Temperature and DAC tracking

For 4LFF CTO Server:

 - Controller
* Once the above selections are completed, configurator to show the relevant Smart Chassis naming/ ID for the customer based on Smart Chassis Matrix.

* 30C Ampient Temperature and DAC tracking
Rules:
Mixing of different Processor is NOT allowed.
Max 1.

If the selected Processor Wattage is less than or equal to 185W, then "Standard Heatsink and Standard Fan" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected. 

Configurator to default "Standard Heatsink" and "Standard Fan" upon Processor selection. But Customer is allowed to remove and select "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" OR "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan"

If the selected Processor Wattage is more than 185W and less than or equal to 270W, then "Performance Heatsink and Performance Fan" OR "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" must be selected.
 
Configurator to default "Performance Heatsink" and "Performance Fan" upon Processor selection. But customer should be allowed to remove and select "DLC Module and Performance Fan" OR "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling".

If Processor Wattage is more than 300W, then "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" or "DLC Module" must be selected. 
Configurator to default "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" upon Processor selection and allow the customer to remove and select "DLC Module".

For Processor Wattage <271W:

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected, then Maximum Processor selection will be reduced from 2 to 1.
Rules:
Quantity of Processor and Quantity of Heatsink must match.
If DLC Module is selected, then Minimum 2 quantity of Processor must be selected.
If "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" is selected, then Fan cannot be selected.
If "Closed Loop Liquid Cooling" is selected, then "Performance Heat Sink"/ "Standard Heat sink" cannot be selected.

Max 1 of Liquid cooling can be selected from the below:
 - Closed Loop Liquid Cooling
 - DLC Module
If Standard Heatsink is selected, then Performance fan cannot be selected.
If Performance Heatsink is selected, then Standard fan cannot be selected.
If Standard Heatsink is selected in 1 Processor configuration, then "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U Stnd Fan Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
If Standard Heatsink is selected in 2 Processor configuration, then both "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U Stnd Fan Kit" and "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" must be selected and be defaulted.
If "DLC Module" is selected, then "Secondary FH Riser" cannot be selected.
If DLC Module is selected, then "Secondary LP Riser" must be selected and be defaulted.

If customer selects "DLC Module" which is a Direct Liquid Cooled solution (DLC)  then below Warning Message to be displayed in the configurators/ CLIC:
Warning: "DLC Solution is supported with specific Racks only. Please refer QuickSpecs for more details.

If customer selects "DLC Module" which is a Direct Liquid Cooled solution (DLC) and server is ordered as Standalone (without any HPE Rack), then below Warning Message to be displayed in the configurators/ CLIC:

Warning Message: “DL360 Gen12 DLC support requires liquid cooling infrastructure items as follows: HPE Rack, Rack Manifold, CDU, Primary Hose Kit and Secondary Hose Kit in order to function. If customer already has this infrastructure to support DLC on site, then server can be shipped as a standalone unit as an upgrade. Server will not function without these infrastructure for DLC.

If NVMe/ SAS4 is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling Heatsink or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling ot DLC Module.

If Networking/ InfiniBand that is 100G or more, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid Cooling Heatsink or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling or DLC Module

If 256GB DIMM is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling or DLC Module

If NS204i-u is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling or DLC Module
If 256GB DIMM is selected without DLC Module, then high speed Networking/ InfiniBand card (PCIe and OCP) that is 100G or more cannot be selected.
If PCIe DLC Module is selected, then slot# 3 cannot be used. This must be considered for all PCIe card selection.

If Closed Loop Liquid Cooling is selected with 1 Processor, then configurator (OCx/ CLIC) should trigger Warning with below message:
"If Customer purchase Closed Loop Liquid Cooling with 1 Processor from HPE now, they are not allowed to upgrade the server with 2nd Processor in their field due to the installation complexity."
If Performance Heatsink or DLC Module is selected, then Performance Fan must be selected and be defaulted. vice versa
Rules:

Below Warning message to be displayed in the configurators upon selection:
"More detailed information about Memory population rules can be found in Server Memory SharePoint https://www.hpe.com/docs/server-memory"
x8 and x4 cannot be mixed.
3DS and non-3DS Memory cannot be mixed.
96GB Memory cannot be mixed with any other Memory.
128GB Memory cannot be mixed with any other Memory.
Mixing of different Rank Memory is not allowed if less than 16 quantity of Memory is selected for 1 Processor configuration.
Mixing of different Rank Memory is not allowed if less than 32 quantity of Memory is selected for 2 Processor configuration.
If different Rank Memory are mixed, then quantity of each Memory part number must be same.
16GB & 256GB are allowed with Granite Rapids CPU (6xxxP) only.
If 256GB DIMM is selected, then Maximum 8 quantity of Memory can be selected per Processor.
Rules:
If Qty 32 of Memory is selected, then DIMM Blanks kit cannot be selected.
If Standard Heatsink or Performance Heat sink is selected and total Memory selection is less than 32 quantity, then DIMM blank must be selected and be defaulted.
If CLLC or DLC is selected with 256GB DIMM and the Total DIMM selection is less than 32 quantity, then DIMM blank must be selected and be defaulted.
If CLLC or DLC is selected without 256GB DIMM, then DIMM blank cannot be selected
Rules:
Supported with Hybrid CTO Server only.
Supported with 8SFF CTO Server only.

2SFF x4 and 2SFF x4 Stacking drive cages will be able to support SFF NVMe when there is no controller selected for these drive cages. 
Direct Attach is capable to support SFF NVMe only in these drive cages.

4EDSFF drive cage will be able to support EDSFF NVMe drive when there is no controller selected. 
Direct Attach is capable to support EDSFF NVMe only in this drive cage.

For EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1) and "HPE OEM FIO Approved Server Appliance" is not selected, then CLIC should trigger below UNB:
"This system does not meet the EU Lot9 energy efficiency requirements and cannot be put into service, installed, or supplied in the EU. 96% efficient (Titanium) FlexSlot power supply is mandated to meet the Lot9 requirements."

For non-EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1), then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" must be defaulted in configurator.

For non-EU countries:
- If non-compliant power supply SKU is selected as factory integrated (FIO/ 0D1) and "HPE OEM FIO Approved Server Appliance" is not selected, then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" must be selected and be defaulted. 
If the "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" is not selected in this scenario, then Configurator RED ERROR/ CLIC UNB must be triggered with the below message. 
"This system does not meet the EU Lot9 energy efficiency requirements and cannot be put into service, installed, or supplied in the EU. 96% efficient (Titanium) FlexSlot power supply is mandated to meet the Lot9 requirements."

Below Warning message to be displayed in the configurators upon the selection of this SKU:
"Use of iLO Common Password SKU sets the initial iLO password to be a well-known string rather than a random password.
It is advisable to match the order quantity of this SKU matching the quantity of servers being ordered.”
Rules:
If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 1 Processor and Single Rank memory, then Memory Min = 2 and Max= 16.
If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 1 Processor and Dual/Quad/ Octal Rank memory then, Memory Min = 1 and Max= 16.
If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 2 Processors and Single Rank memory, then Memory Min = 4 and Max= 32.
If Memory Fast Fault Tolerance kit is selected with 2 Processors and Dual/Quad/ Octal Rank memory, then Memory Min = 2 and Max= 32
If Memory Fault Tolerance is selected, then only x4 memory options can be selected.
Rules:

(i) If this part number is selected then the following RAID rules do not apply:
        - Max of 1 RAID level per server.
        - All integrated hard drives must match.
        - Minimum drive quantity requirement for each RAID level.
        - RAID level must be selected if Factory Installed OS is present and Smart Array SAS controller (embedded or otherwise) is the primary controller.

(ii) If this part number is selected, then at least 1 hard drive must be on the order.

(iii) If this part number is selected, then preinstalled OS must be on the order.

A Customer Intent Document must be supplied if this part number is ordered. 
This Customer Intent Document should include all details about the desired RAID custom configuration.  (  This includes drive part #s and quantities, RAID levels desired, which drives should be applied to each RAID level, and if a preinstalled OS has been ordered - which RAID set it should be installed on )

General RAID rules: 
If user selects any one of the above RAID settings, then the below requirements must be met.
i. Any one of the controllers must be selected (refer to controller priority list in Model X section)
ii. Any of the drives with SAS/SATA/NVMe in description (under Hard Drive category) must be selected.
iii. All drives used in RAID must be the same part number.
iv. If Factory installed OS and Controller are present, then RAID must be selected.
v.  Minimum drives as mentioned below must be selected,
                - (i) RAID 0 requires at least 1 drive.
                - (ii) RAID 1 requires at least 2 or even number of drives.
               - (iii) RAID 1 with Spare requires at least 3 drives.
               - (iv) RAID 5 requires at least 3 drives. 
               - (v) RAID 5 with Spare requires at least 4 drives. 
               - (vi) RAID Adv requires at least 4 drives.
If MR416i-p/ MR416i-o/ MR408i-o is the Primary controller, then all RAID levels are allowed.
If MR216i-o/MR216i-p is the primary controller, then only following RAID levels are allowed: 0, 1
If Premium VROC is the primary controller, then the following RAID levels are allowed: 0, 1, 5.
If Intel VROC RAID1 is the primary controller, then the following RAID levels are allowed: 1.
If Direct Attach is the Primary controller, then RAID is NOT allowed.

Warning message to be displayed in the configurators if "HPE Customer Defined RAID Setti ALL" is selected with one Internal controller.
HPE Recommends to use below standard RAID Settings,
 - 339777-B21 - HPE RAID 0 Drive 1 FIO Setting 
 - 339778-B21 - HPE RAID 1 Drive 1 FIO Setting
 - 339779-B21 - HPE RAID 5 Drive 1 FIO Setting
 - 339780-B21 - HPE RAID 5 w/SP Drive 1 FIO Setting
 - 339781-B21 - HPE Raid Adv Data Guarding FIO

Rules:
If Secondary riser is selected, then 2 Processor must be selected.
If Secondary riser is not selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is not selected, then maximum 2 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
If Secondary FH riser is not selected, then maximum 1 quantity of FH PCIe cards can selected.
If Secondary riser is not selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is selected, then maximum 1 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
If Secondary FH riser is selected, then maximum 2 quantity of PCIe cards can be selected.
If Secondary LP riser is selected and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" is not selected, then maximum 3 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
If Secondary LP riser and "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" are selected, then maximum 2 quantity of PCIe cards can selected.
Rules:
Max 1 of 4Port BASE-T / Full Height card can be selected if secondary riser is not selected. Cannot be installed in Slot# 2.
Max 2 of 4Port BASE-T / Full Height card can be selected if secondary riser is selected. Cannot be installed in Slot# 2.
If both 4Port BASE-T Networking (Base-T and Full-Height) and Half-Height Internal PCIe controller are selected, then Secondary FH riser cannot be selected.

- 455883-B21 - HPE BLc 10G SFP+ SR Transceiver

- 845398-B21 - HPE 25Gb SFP28 SR 100m Transceiver

Rules:

Warning Message has to be displayed in the configurator any time this OCP card is selected:
""CPU1 to OCPA x16"" or "CPU2 to OCPB x16" OCP Upgrade kit can be selected with this OCP card if customer wants to have OCP x16 connectivity."

If One quantity of x16 OCP card is selected, then one of "CPU1 to OCPA x16" or "CPU2 to OCPB x16" enablement kit must be selected.

Configurator to default "CPU1 to OCPA x16" and allow customer to remove and select "CPU2 to OCPB x16".

If Two quantity of x16 OCP card is selected, then both "CPU1 to OCPA x16" and "CPU2 to OCPB x16" enablement kit must be selected.

Configurator to default "CPU1 to OCPA x16" and "CPU2 to OCPB x16".

If Two quantity of OCP card is selected, then "CPU1 to OCPB x8" or "CPU2 to OCPB x8" enablement kit must be selected.

Configurator to default "CPU1 to OCPB x8" and allow customer to remove and select "CPU2 to OCPB x8".
If "BCM 57608 100GbE 2p QSFP112 OCP3 Adptr" is selected with Closed Loop Liquid Cooling, then Maximum 1 quantity of Processor can be selected.
Rules:
If both 4Port BASE-T Networking (Base-T and Full-Height) and Half-Height Internal PCIe controller are selected, then Secondary FH riser cannot be selected.

Only display the compatible/ supported transceiver and hide the remaining Transceiver.
Supported Transceivers are:
- P65334-B21 - HPE IB NDR/EN 400G QSFP112 MM 50m XCVR
Rules:
"CPU1 to OCPB x8" and "CPU1 to OCPA x16" cannot be selected together.
"CPU2 to OCPB x16" and "CPU2 to OCPB x8" cannot be selected together.
If "CPU2 to OCPB x16" or "CPU2 to OCPB x8" is selected, then 2 Processor must be selected.

Max 1 of below OCPB upgrade cable can be selected.

 - CPU1 to OCPB x8
 - CPU2 to OCPB x8
 - CPU2 to OCPB x16
Max 1 of "CPU1 to OCPA x16" can be selected
Rules:
Supported with 4LFF CTO Model only.
Anyone of the cable kit can be selected for 4LFF CTO Server
If "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" is selected, then OROC controller must be selected.
If "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" is selected, then PCIe controller must be selected.
Supported with 8SFF CTO Model only.
Maximum 1 of 8SFF cable kit can be selected
Maximum 1 of 2SFF cable kit can be selected
If "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS OCPA Cntr Cbl Kit" is selected, then 2SFF x4 drive cage and OROC controller must be selected.
If "HPE DL360 G12 2SFF SBS PCIe1 Ctr Cbl Kit" is selected, then 2SFF x4 drive cage and MR216i-p/ MR416i-p controller must be selected.
Supported with Hybrid CTO Model only.
HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B2 Cbl Kit" cannot be selected together with "HPE DL360 Gen12 4EDSFF x4 P1 B3 Cbl Kit" in 1 Processor configuration
Rules:
If NS204i-u is selected, then either NS204i-u Front or Internal or Rear Enable must be selected and vice versa.

Max 1 of below NS204i-u enablement kit can be selected:
* NS204i-u Front 
* NS204i-u Internal
* NS204i-u Rear
If Secondary FH riser is selected, then "NS204i-u Rear Enable Kit" cannot be selected.
Max 1 of NS204i-u can be selected.
If 2 quantity of PCIe controllers are selected, then Rear NS204i-u cannot be selected
Rules:

For 4LFF CTO Model:
If OROC controller is selected with LFF drive, then "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 OCPA Cntrl Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

For 4LFF CTO Model:
If PCIe controller is selected with LFF drive, then "HPE DL360 G12 4LFF x1 PCIe1 Cntr Cbl Kit" must be selected and be defaulted

For 4LFF CTO Model:
Max 1 of controller can be selected.

If any of these controller is selected, then "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" or "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl" must be selected and vice versa. "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" to be defaulted and customer is allowed to remove and select "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl".

8SFF CTO Model:
If controller is selected, then Drive cage must be selected.
Rules:

If "HPE 96W Smart Stg Li-ion Batt 145mm Kit" or "HPE Smart Hybrid Capacitor w/ 145mm Cbl" is selected, then "HPE DL360 Gen11 Stg Cntrl Enable Cbl Kit" must be selected and Vice versa.

Configurator to default "HPE DL360 Gen11 Stg Cntrl Enable Cbl Kit" upon the Battery/ Capacitor selection.
Max 1 of Storage Battery can be selected.
Max 1 of Storage Battery cable kit can be selected per server.

BTO/ Standalone behavior (CLIC Error only):
The Configuration has exceeded maximum quantity of 96W Smart Storage Battery (P01366-B21) per Line item, the max allowed per Line Item is 80.  Please adjust accordingly”
Rules:
Mixing of different Graphics Option is not allowed.

If GPU is selected then below Warning message to be dispalyed in OCA and CLIC: 
"For best performance across common workloads, HPE recommends system main memory at least twice the memory of all GPU."

If Graphics Option is selected, then Performance Heatsink or Closed Loop Liquid cooling or DLC Module must be selected.

Configurator to default Performance Heatsink. User will be allowed to remove and select Closed Loop Liquid Cooling ot DLC Module
If Graphics Option is selected, then 256GB DIMM cannot be selected.
Rules:
If "DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" is selected, then "DL3X0 Gen11 1U Std Fan Kit" should also be selected and be defaulted.
If "DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" is selected, then 2 Processor must be selected.
If 2 Processor is selected with "DL3X0 Gen11 1U Std Fan Kit", then "HPE DL3X0 Gen11 1U 2P Std Fan Kit" must be selected.
Min/ Max is not applicable. However Maximum One quantity of Tubeset can be selected per server.
If DLC Module is selected, then "HPE DL3XX Gen11 DLC 45cm QD Tube FIO Kit" must be selected and vice versa.
Max 1 of each can be selected. However Performance Fan cannot be selected with Standard Fan kits.
Rules:
Mixing of different Power supply SKU is not allowed.

Warning to be displayed in the Configurator upon selection:
In order to select the right size power supply for your ProLiant Server it is highly recommended to use "HPE Power Advisor" located at "https://poweradvisorext.it.hpe.com/?Page=Index".

OCA should display the following Pop-Up Warning Message when this option is selected:

"The power supply selected only supports high line voltage (200VAC to 240VAC)."

For EU countries:
- These power supply SKUs are non-compliant in EU countries and should be hidden in the configurator.
If "HPE Energy Star4.0 configuration FIO kit" selected, then these Power Supply cannot be selected and to be hidden.

For non-EU countries:
If a Lot 9 compliant power supply is configured, then "HPE CE Mark Removal FIO Enable Kit" cannot be selected.
If 1600W DC Power supply is selected, then either "HPE 1600W DC PSU Power Cable Kit" or "HPE 1600W DC PSU Power Lug Option Kit" must be selected and quantity must match. vice versa
Rules:

Quantity of Power supply and Power cord must match if "HPE Remove Standard Power Cords" is not selected
-All Regions (Except Japan) - OCA/CLIC UNB
-For Japan - OCA/CLIC Warning"

Warning to be displayed in the Configurator upon selection: 
"If final destination is India, you must order BIS India power cord(s) equal to quantity of power supplies and 469774-409 under "Manufacturing Services"  to remove all standard world wide power cords from shipment"

“Configurator/ CLIC to trigger Warning anytime AF559A is selected as BTO/ Standalone (i.,e, without 0D1) for Thailand, with the below message:
“Please try to quote AF559A as 0D1, any standalone selection of AF559A requires an exceptional approval from Thai Industrial Standards Institute (TISI) upon shipment arrival, which may delay the delivery plan or may get rejected if there is no power supply involved in the order”
AC Power cords can only be selected with AC Power supply only.

Configurator behavior for DL - Rack Model when AC Power supply is selected:
* For All countries except China/ India/ Japan: Configurator to default "P78156-B21 HPE C13 - C14 250V 10A 3m FIO Pwr Cord". User can remove and select other supported power cord.

Configurator behavior for DL - Rack Model when AC Power supply is selected:
* For China: Configurator to default "P78131-B21 HPE C13 - GB1002 250V 1.83m FIO Pwr Cord". User can remove and select other supported power cord.

Configurator behavior for DL - Rack Model when AC Power supply is selected:
* For India: Configurator to default "P78147-B21 HPE C13 - C14 250V 2m IN FIO Pwr Cord". User can remove and select other supported power cord.

Configurator behavior for DL - Rack Model when AC Power supply is selected:
* For Japan: Configurator to default "P78144-B21 HPE C13 - JIS C8303 100V 2m FIO Pwr Cord". User can remove and select other supported power cord.
Power cord cannot be selected if "HPE Remove Standard Power Cords" is in the configuration.
